3 Components #

3.1 Headings #

Headings & stuff

3.1.1 Colors #

See chapter 5.1.2 Swatches for color uses.

3.1.2 Sizes #

Examples
Default styling

Heading

.heading--xs - Extra small heading

Heading

.heading--s - Small heading

Heading

.heading--m - Medium heading

Heading

.heading--l - Large heading

Heading

.heading--xxl - Extra large heading

Heading

<p class="heading [modifier class]">Heading</p>

3.2 Box #

Generic content block

3.2.1 Colors #

Examples
Default styling

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--white - White box

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--yellow - Yellow box

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--gray - Gray box

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

<div class="box [modifier class]">
	<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
</div>

3.2.2 Sizes #

Examples
Default styling

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--xxs - Padding 1rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--xs - Padding 2rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--s - Padding 3rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--m - Padding 4rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--l - Padding 5rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--xl - Padding 6rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

.box--xxl - Padding 7rem

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

<div class="box box--yellow [modifier class]">
	<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
</div>

3.3 Bubble #

.bubble

Example
<div class="bubble bubble--l [modifier class]">
	<svg viewBox="0 0 121.9 99.8" class="icon icon--m"><use xlink:href="../svg/sprite/main.svg#service-twitter"></use></svg>
</div>

3.3.1 Sizes bubble #

.bubble

Example
1 
<div class="bubble bubble--xs [modifier class]">
	<span class="bubble--inner">1</span>
</div>
<div class="bubble bubble--m [modifier class]">
	<svg viewBox="0 0 121.9 99.8" class="icon icon--s"><use xlink:href="../svg/sprite/main.svg#service-twitter"></use></svg>
</div>
<div class="bubble bubble--l [modifier class]">
	<svg viewBox="0 0 121.9 99.8" class="icon icon--m"><use xlink:href="../svg/sprite/main.svg#service-twitter"></use></svg>
</div>

3.3.2 Colors bubble #

Examples
Default styling
.bubble--white - White bubble
.bubble--whiteTransparent - White transparent bubble
.bubble--yellow - Yellow bubble
.bubble--yellowTransparent - Yellow transparent bubble
.bubble--black - Black bubble
.bubble--blackTransparent - Black transparent bubble
<div class="bubble bubble--l [modifier class]">
	<svg viewBox="0 0 121.9 99.8" class="icon icon--m"><use xlink:href="../svg/sprite/main.svg#service-twitter"></use></svg>
</div>

3.4 Buttons #

Examples
Default styling
.btn--red - Red button
.btn--blue - Blue button
<button class="btn [modifier class]">Click me</button>
<button class="btn [modifier class]" disabled>Disabled</button>

3.4.1 Primary buttons #

Examples
Default styling
.btn--red - Red button
.btn--blue - Blue button
<button class="btn btn--primary [modifier class]">Click me</button>
<button class="btn btn--primary [modifier class]" disabled>Disabled</button>

3.4.2 Secondary buttons #

Examples
Default styling
.btn--red - Red button
.btn--blue - Blue button
<button class="btn btn--secondary [modifier class]">Click me</button>
<button class="btn btn--secondary [modifier class]" disabled>Disabled</button>
